name: Sylvetica
comment:
>>39230072

There's something about that scratching, pacing and rhythmic, like a heartbeat though not uniform, different enough each time to be slightly disconcerting. It increases in volume, as you listen. It reaches out to you—then, you feel it, pulling you at the shoulders, tugging sharply, dragging you downward. It feels like the walls are unfolding around you, and you can see...

“Ashe?” Nel asks. He grabs onto your arm, jarring you back to reality. “Are you alright?”

“Yeah, fine, sorry.” You shake your head.

“This place is giving me a bad feeling too, yeah?” He says. “Let's get out of here.”

He pulls you toward the staircase, and the two of you cross back into the hallway, stopping abruptly when the door slams behind you.

Archiving. I'm back, and I think I'm doing a fair bit better health-wise. I won't be able to run as frequently as before for a while, but I'm still alive for now. Will keep everyone updated.
